response.original_title: Blind Guardian: Somewhere Far Beyond - Revisited: Live at Rock Hard Festival 2022
response.overview: Prior to releasing the much lauded “The God Machine” opus in September 2022, BLIND GUARDIAN had been performing “Somewhere Far Beyond” in its entirety at Rock Hard Festival and Hellfest in Summer 2022 in front of ten thousands of fans singing along each track word by word, both shows were filmed and recorded professionally and aired via WDR and ARTE. This video is the official recording of Blind Guardian's performance at the Rock Hard Festival in Gelsenkirchen, Germany in June 2002.
response.title: Blind Guardian: Somewhere Far Beyond - Revisited: Live at Rock Hard Festival 2022
